channel.title: 🏢 University Potsdam on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 University Potsdam on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: Data subsampling for Poisson regression with pth-root-link
item.description: Sublinear coresets for Poisson regression are developed, offering 1±ε approximation guarantees, with complexity analyzed using a novel parameter and domain shifting.
